About App Version %1$s Empowering learners through intelligent audio insights. AudioScholar is a smart, student-focused platform that transforms lecture audio into structured summaries and personalized learning resources. Designed for learners, it simplifies note-taking, enhances comprehension, and bridges the gap between passive listening and active understanding — all powered by AI and accessible across devices. Key Features: Record and summarize lectures Upload audio for AI processing Get YouTube video recommendations Secure login via Email, Google, GitHub Optional cloud sync with Nhost Developed By: Adviser: Frederick L. App Info App Version
Welcome to AudioScholar! Tired of frantically scribbling notes while trying to absorb complex lectures? AudioScholar lets you capture every word effortlessly, so you can truly focus on learning in the moment. We turn lectures into your personal study archive. Capture Lectures Your Way Record lectures in real-time directly within the app using your device\'s microphone – works even offline! Already have audio files? Easily upload pre-recorded lectures from your device via the mobile app or our web interface.
Get Smart Summaries & Resources Go beyond just recordings. Our powerful AI automatically generates concise, structured summaries, highlighting key points. Plus, discover relevant YouTube videos recommended based on lecture content to deepen your understanding.
Your Learning Hub, Synced Keep your learning organized. Optionally sync recordings and summaries to the cloud for secure backup and access across your devices via our web interface. Ready to start? We\'ll need microphone access to enable lecture recording.
Microphone Permission Needed AudioScholar needs access to your microphone to record lectures directly within the app. Please grant permission to enable this feature. Open Settings Dismiss
